Join 0800 75 87 87 Enquire 0800 75 87 87 Holidays Home Home Flights Flights South Pacific Australia Asia UK & Europe North America South America Africa Holidays Holidays South Pacific Australia New Zealand Asia UK & Europe North America Sports and Events Tours Helloworld Exclusives Imagine Holidays Hotels Hotels South Pacific Australia New Zealand Asia UK & Europe North America South America Africa Middle East Cruise Cruise Stores Stores Northland Auckland & Auckland Region Waikato Coromandel Bay of Plenty incl Rotorua & Tauranga Hawkes Bay Manawatu & Whanganui New Plymouth Wairarapa Porirua and Paraparaumu Hutt Valley Wellington Nelson, Marlborough & Tasman Christchurch & Canterbury Region Southland Otago Extras Extras About Us Allianz Travel Insurance A.T.A Blog Careers Cash Passport Cover-More Travel Insurance Explore Magazine Finance & Payment Options Franchise Opportunities Gift Cards Helloworld Travel Academy Travel Brochures Weddings Subscribe Subscribe Home > Holidays > Tours > Australia > Australia > Ultimate Journeys - East Kimberley Escapade Favourites Enquire Clear Email Print Brochure Share Ultimate Journeys - East Kimberley Escapade Awe Inspiring Landscapes Your Australia Tour A journey through East Kimberley is a breathtaking immersion into one of Australia's most remote and awe-inspiring landscapes. From the ancient red ranges of the Carr Boyd and Cockburn to the serene waters of Lake Argyle and the mighty Ord River, every moment is steeped in natural wonder and cultural richness. Whether you're exploring the mystical Bungle Bungle Range in Purnululu National Park, or connecting with the stories of the Ngarinyin people, East Kimberley offers a travel experience that is both humbling and unforgettable – a true escape into the heart of the Kimberley wilderness. HIGHLIGHTS: Witness a spectacular Kimberley sunset from the middle of Lake Kununurra Explore the vast waterways of the East Kimberley, with cruises on Lake Argyle and the Ord River Unique cliffside dining experience under the stars overlooking Lake Argyle Enjoy a soothing soak at Zebedee Springs thermal rock pools, surrounded by Livistona palms Experience Injiid Marlabu Calls Us, a cultural immersion with the Ngarinyin people Take to the air for a scenic flight over some of the East Kimberley’s most iconic landscapes INCLUSIONS: 2 nights in Kununurra 1 night in Lake Argyle 2 nights in El Questro Select meals, sightseeing PLUS MORE! YOUR TRAVEL DATES: 27 May 26 Kimberley Ultimate Journey A journey through East Kimberley is a breathtaking immersion into one of Australia's most remote and awe-inspiring landscapes. From the ancient red ranges of the Carr Boyd and Cockburn to the serene waters of Lake Argyle and the mighty Ord River, every moment is steeped in natural wonder and cultural richness. Whether you're exploring the mystical Bungle Bungle Range in Purnululu National Park, or connecting with the stories of the Ngarinyin people, East Kimberley offers a travel experience that is both humbling and unforgettable - a true escape into the heart of the Kimberley wilderness. 1 Bedroom Apt/Deluxe 1 Bedroom Cabin/Tented Cabin (5 Nights) Travel Dates: 27 May - 1 Jun 26 Twin per person fr $7,049 Single per person fr $8,450 Note: ^Excluding beverages. A minimum non-refundable deposit equivalent to 20% of the tour cost is payable within 7 days of confirmation of your booking and cancellation prior to final payment will result in your deposit being forfeited. Final payment of your holiday cost is required at least 100 days prior to departure, there will be no refund for bookings cancelled less than 91 days prior to travel. A minimum of 16 passengers is required for this tour to operate on a group basis with a tour leader. Information required at time of booking - full name, including title, initial and surname as per ID, any information relating to dietary/mobility/medical requirements and mobile contact number. Includes 2 nights accommodation at Freshwater East Kimberley Apartments in a One Bedroom Apartment with breakfast daily - Kununurra Sunset Dinner Cruise with nibbles, wild-caught saltwater barramundi or threadfin salmon, steak, salad, and dessert as well as alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages Ord River Experience with riverside lunch with cold meats and salad buffet and soft drinks 1 night accommodation at Discovery Resorts, Lake Argyle in a Deluxe One Bedroom Cabin with breakfast - Cliffside Dinner Experience overlooking Lake Argyle with family-style menu cooked over open coals and inclusive of beer, wine and soft drinks - Kimberley Durack Lunch Explorer Cruise with fresh grazing style lunch, complimentary beer, wine, and soft drink 2 nights accommodation at Discovery Resorts, El Questro, Emma Gorge in a Tented Cabin with ensuite bathroom with breakfast daily - 2-course set menu dinner at El Questro Emma Gorge nightly^ - Beef and Barra lunch at El Questro Station^ - Zebedee Springs access - Exclusive Injiid Marlabu Calls Us experience - Exclusive flight from El Questro Airstrip to Purnululu National Park, returning to Kununurra - Domes and Kungkalanayi Lookout Experience - 2-course farewell dinner at the Pumphouse Kununurra^ Return transfers from Kununurra Airport to Freshwater East Kimberley Apartments - 4WD transfers from Lake Argyle to Emma Gorge - Services of a Tour Leader - Small group travel, maximum 20 guests Per Person, from $7,049 Enquire More Deals Enquire *Terms and Conditions It is our policy to present the cost of our holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase . Travel agent professional service fees where charged, will be additional to the advertised prices . Closeout and blackout periods apply over school holidays and peak holiday periods & availability of seats & rooms is likely to be very limited over this time . Valid for sales to 31 Mar 2026. Valid for travel commenced and completed within the period 27 May 2026 to 1 Jun 2026 (unless otherwise specified).Price changes may occur by reason of matters outside our control which increase the cost of a Product or Service, including, but not limited to the introduction of fuel surcharges, changes to taxes or fees, or currency exchange.A minimum nonrefundable deposit equivalent to 20% of the tour cost is payable within 7 days of confirmation of your booking and cancellation prior to final payment will result in your deposit being forfeited. Final payment of your holiday cost is required at least 100 days prior to departure, there will be no refund for bookings cancelled less than 91 days prior to travel. The travel services provided by these suppliers are subject to the conditions imposed by the suppliers and their liability may be limited by their tariffs, conditions of carriage, and agreements. A minimum of 10 passengers is required for this tour to operate on a group basis with a tour leader. Information required at time of booking - full name, including title, initial and surname as per ID, any information relating to dietary/mobility/medical requirements and mobile contact number. A fee will apply for payments made by debit and credit card which may vary. Travel agents may also charge service fees. Please check all prices, availability, and other information with your travel consultant before booking. Prices shown are based on per person costs in New Zealand Dollars, for payment by cash, cheque or eftpos only. Credit card sales not permitted unless Travel Agent acts as a merchant. Capacity limitations apply and may not be available on all services. Travel requiring an overnight stay in New Zealand will be at passengers own expense. Events beyond our control such as currency fluctuations and changes to the price of aviation fuel may result in prices variations . Strict cancellation fees apply. Packages are based on consecutive nights. For full terms and conditions and cancellation fees please contact your local travel agent for more information. Trade enquiries via GO Holidays. ISSUE DATE: 26 AUG 25.
